info.text: There seems to be a Lymph Gland in the elavator.
Several Lymph Nodes crawled away from the gland and into your backpack.
commands: add_prop {"type": "NPC","x": 7,"y": 5,"config": {"direction": "4","color": 1,"info": [{"text": "Oh hey there. Can you press Floor4b? Thanks. You must be a visiting, welcome to the body of Juan.","commands": ["add_prop{}"]},{"text": "That's a cool Lymph Node you got there.","commands": []},{"text": "Did you know that the major organs of the lymphatic system are the lymph nodes, which are filters for particles that come from outside the body.","commands": []},{"text": "The purpose of the system is to store and carry white blood cells, and to collect lost fluid to return the fluid to the blood.","commands": []},{"text": "Oh, it seems like this is our floor.","commands": ["lde default/circulatory"]}]}}
